/usr/bin/g++ -std=c++20 -Djosuerom -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Werror -Weffc++ -Wconversion  -Wno-unused-result -Wno-char-subscripts -Wfloat-equal -Wvla -Wduplicated-cond -Wlogical-op -Wredundant-decls -ggdb3 -D_GLIBCXX_DEBUG -D_GLIBCXX_DEBUG_PEDANTIC -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -fsanitize=address -fdiagnostics-color=always -g CMakeFiles/codeforces.dir/solutions/1367B_Even_Array.cpp.o -o codeforces
